name: A Simple Puzzle like Rusty Lake
name_original: A Simple Puzzle like Rusty Lake
description:
警告：本游戏仅支持简体中文（不过文本量不大，看不懂应该也能玩明白）

这是一个仿照锈湖做的解谜游戏，由于我本人不是CS和美术专业的学生，因此这个游戏做的很简陋，故免费放出供大家游玩。

我以后想成为游戏策划，你们在游玩后能给我一些建议吗（策划方向的），谢谢大家了。

该游戏仅支持1920*1080分辨率,下载后点击“解谜2.exe”开始游戏

Warning: This game only supports Simplified Chinese (although the text volume is not large, you should be able to play it even if you don't understand it)

This is a puzzle game modeled after Rust Lake. As I am not a CS or art major student myself, this game is made very rudimentary, so it is released for free for everyone to play.

I want to become a game designer in the future. Can you give me some advice on the designing direction after playing? Thank you all.

This game only supports 1920 * 1080 resolution,After downloading, click on "解谜 2. exe" to start the game.

（English text translated by translation software）
